sub_title: Global Head of Marketing, Customer Services & Solutions, IGT Systems, Philips Healthcare
summary: 20+ years of international learning in the Healthcare, Hi-Tech, Telecommunications and Consumer Electronics industry across 5 countries with major impact as a developer, product manager, corporate entrepreneur, team leader and business leader. Currently managing a complete services and solutions organization in Healthcare industry as marketing lead worldwide.

education.field_of_study: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Hindi, English, Sanskrit

profile_positions.description:
+ Orchestrating the services and solutions portfolio transformation for Images Guided Therapy systems from being a hardware vendor to a solutions provider (e.g. subscription, upgrade etc.) by setting up key building blocks leading to creation of new services.

+ Led the cross-functional team of product managers, clinical marketing and architects to create and launch set of Technology upgrade solutions for clinical customers stakeholders with multiple customer wins.
 
+ Leading the product management team for the launch of a new services and solution portfolio in upgrade, maintenance, optimization and integration services for Image Guided Therapy systems across multiple markets across Asia, Europe and Americas
profile_positions.title: Global Head of Marketing, Customer Services & Solutions, IGT Systems

profile_positions.description:
+ Created a 3 year strategic plan for Greater China business and led the execution with new product ranges based on deep consumer insights and activation (ATL & BTL). 

+ Led a x-functional team of  Marketing, R&D, Supply, purchasing and finance professionals to optimize the E2E value chain for the faster delivery of products & services in China with a 6 weeks of lead time from idea to market for additional sales during JD (6.18) and TMall (11.11) brand days. 

+ Built the Greater china marketing organization by recruiting and nurturing local talent in marketing and  with partnerships including China Disney for the launch of Star Wars shaver range for incremental yearly sales.
profile_positions.title: Business Development & Marketing Leader, Male Grooming

profile_positions.description:
+ Initiated the creation Philips Shaver Series 5000 and New AquaTouch ranges from idea (Concept and VPW creation) and launched new ranges to market with a highly x-functional team in business, functions and markets.  

+ Led numerous customer engagements for various markets and international customers such as MediaMarkt (Netherlands), Real (Germany) and BOOTS (UK) ensuring the listing and activation for Series 5000 and AquaTouch ranges. 
 
+Managed few highly complex Integrated product development project with each a total business case worth billion+ € leading to creation of one of the highest margin generator range for the Male grooming business. 

+ Led the asset creation from marketing side to establish a highly reusable and modular way of assets creation leading to a drastic reduction (~90%) in marginal cost of asset creation ensuring an end-to-end delivery and activation (ATL, TTL, BTL) of Philips Series 5000 in different markets across multiple consumer and customer touch points.
profile_positions.title: Global Director, Consumer Marketing, Personal Care, Male Grooming

profile_positions.description:
+ Managed 1st ever End to End (E2E) pilot in biggest Business market combination (North America Male Grooming) and established way of working across Philips for E2E projects with outstanding results on time to market (25% reduction), key processes (market introduction) and customer collaboration (Walmart).   

+ Designed and developed integrated start methodology and guided projects involving x-functional teams across Philips business (Domestic Appliances, Personal Care and Health & wellness) to create consumer value propositions achieving time to market improvement by up to 30%.
profile_positions.title: Director, Innovation and Development, CTO Office

profile_positions.description:
+ Designed and deployed a transformation program (Accelerate!) including processes across Philips consumer lifestyle leading to a reduction in time to market of ~30%. 
 
+ Led projects involving cross-functional teams within Domestic appliances and incubator businesses to create consumer product propositions that meet high growth needs using Blue Ocean Strategy (BOS) formulation approach.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Manager, Innovation and Development, CTO & COO Office

profile_positions.description:
+ Developed Blue Ocean Strategy cases for Defense, Consumer Goods, Hi-Tech, Imaging and Telecommunications industries. 

+ Interviewed clients (MNCs) to understand the training needs and incorporated developed cases as a part of Blue Ocean Strategy Simulation (BOSS) seminars.
profile_positions.title: Associate Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
+ Product management & Leadership - Extensive experience with more than 20, worldwide mobile terminals (LG’s Chocolate, Shine, Viewty among others) launches with global and various regional European operators as project leader and in-charge of global software deliveries. Worked closely with design, marketing, production, sales and various support teams through various stages from product conception to after sales service for the 3G/GSM mobile handsets. 

+ Communication - Skilled in handling new and complex tasks requiring collaboration with multiple business units and functional groups. Represented LG at international conferences (OMA)
profile_positions.title: Manager/Project Leader

profile_positions.description:
+ System and Software Architecture – Designed and developed systems based on TCP/IP protocol suite with operating Systems including various RTOS such as Nucleus, Vxworks, pSOS and Linux variants. 

+ System Design and Development – Designed and developed components in ISS (intelligent switch solution) offering. Porting of ISS for Layer 2/3 protocols such as STP (802.1d), RSTP (802.1w) /MSTP (802.1s), link aggregation (802.3ad), port authentication, 802.11 Wireless LAN, MPLS, DiffServ etc. on Broadcom and Marvell chipsets. Developed network management/link management software supporting SNMP. 

+ Client Assignments - Developed service control component (FEP) for client’s (Huawei Technologies) intelligent network offering on multiple platforms including Sun Solaris, HP-UX, and IBM AIX using ACE communication frameworks.
profile_positions.title: Senior Member Of Technical Staff

profile_positions.description:
+ Designed and developed applications for real estate industry for a German client on windows platform using SDK/MFC framework. 

+ Developed a Linux shell interface as part of data backup system offered on Linux.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer
